definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
in the country of the blind the one-eyed man is king
pinyin: shan1 zhong1 wu2 lao3 hu3 , hou2 zi5 cheng1 dai4 wang5
containing_words.word: 山中無老虎，猴子稱大王

definition: "monkey steals the peach" (martial arts), distracting an opponent with one hand and seizing his testicles with the other/(coll.) grabbing sb by the balls

sentences.english: It is already so painful for this monkey.
sentences.chinese: 這實驗已經讓猴子頗爲痛苦了。

sentences.english: China is always the price taker not price setter.
sentences.chinese: 中國何必猴子屁股一樣總是紅彤彤的呢？

sentences.english: On the Monkey Mountain the monkeys frolicked and played happily, which attracted the eyes of many tourists.
sentences.chinese: 猴山上猴子們歡鬧玩耍，吸引不少遊客的目光。

sentences.english: Monkeys carrying corn, came under a peach tree.
sentences.chinese: 小猴子扛着玉米，走到一棵桃樹下。

sentences.english: Some of monkeys were touching their left ear with their righthand .
sentences.chinese: 一些猴子正在用他們的右手觸摸他們的左耳。

sentences.english: The monkey is jumping up and down in the trees and is extremely enthusiastic.
sentences.chinese: 這隻猴子在樹間上躥下跳的，異常活躍。

sentences.english: He gave the monkey a banana to eat.
sentences.chinese: 他拿了一根香蕉給那猴子喫。

sentences.english: Little monkey won the prize. He said push the fattest two out.
sentences.chinese: 小猴子得了獎，他說把最胖的兩個人推下去。
猴子跑得很快，公牛追不上。
小猴子，把熊塗成黑顏色。

sentences.english: There were monkeys up in the tree. The hat marker did not know this.
sentences.chinese: 樹上有猴子，帽匠對此並不知情。

sentences.english: Foamy viruses infect some mammals, including monkeys and apes.
sentences.chinese: 泡沫病毒可以感染某些哺乳動物，包括猴子和猿類。

sentences.english: Every monkey has a numbered collar, but each one also has a name.
sentences.chinese: 每隻猴子的項圈都有編號，不過它們同樣也有名字。

sentences.english: Health in the central part of the island to a famous temple monkeys, and monkeys in droves.
sentences.chinese: 在島中部的生宜有著名的猴子廟，猴子成羣結隊。

sentences.english: Health in the central part of the island to a famous temple monkeys, and monkeys in droves.
sentences.chinese: 在島中部的生宜有著名的猴子廟，猴子成羣結隊。

definition: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]/Son Goku, the main character in Dragon Ball 七龍珠|七龙珠[Qi1 long2 zhu1]
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Great Sage the Equal of Heaven, self-proclaimed title of the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
